text: Maniatis can refer to: ==Surname== *Alexander Maniatis, owner of Dopamine Records *Giannis Maniatis, Greek international football (soccer) player *Kostas Maniatis, professional football (soccer) goalkeeper *Tom Maniatis, professor of molecular and cellular biology ;*Maniatis, meaning his cookbook Molecular Cloning: A Laboratory Manual *Peter Maniatis, TV host and boxing promoter ==Place name== *Maniatis, a village in the community of Dafni, Arcadia, Greece
title: Maniatis
